query:
SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.title, COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) as prediction_count, COUNT(DISTINCT t.id) as trade_count
FROM markets m 
LEFT JOIN predictions p ON m.id = p.marketId 
LEFT JOIN trades t ON m.id = t.marketId 
WHERE p.id IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY m.id, m.title 
ORDER BY prediction_count DESC, trade_count DESC
LIMIT 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EZig2ebo1q21z8.root --database 4sa6kfx5mFXsBhiWnpTsNp --execute SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.title, COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) as prediction_count, COUNT(DISTINCT t.id) as trade_count
FROM markets m 
LEFT JOIN predictions p ON m.id = p.marketId 
LEFT JOIN trades t ON m.id = t.marketId 
WHERE p.id IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY m.id, m.title 
ORDER BY prediction_count DESC, trade_count DESC
LIMIT 1;
